channel.title: Kiran Gorapalli - Release Notes & Blog
channel.description: Release notes, updates, and blog posts from Kiran Gorapalli's portfolio site.

item.title: v1.0.19 - Bent Template Restyle & Site Restructure
item.description: Major visual overhaul inspired by the Framer Bent template. Full-width edge-to-edge images with parallax zoom effect, restructured site into 8 work sections (My Work, How I'd've Built It, My Sandbox, Creative Lab, Blog & Podcast, Learning & Certifications, Causes, Store), compact navigation menu, unified dark background, and Fenix AI assistant integration.

item.title: v1.0.11 - Added Go-to-Market Strategy Competency
item.description: Added 5th competency block for Go-to-Market Strategy with updated grid layout to accommodate five columns.

item.title: v1.0.10 - Menu Redesign & Fenix Branding
item.description: Removed brackets from menu items, added downward-right arrow icons, and updated Fenix menu label to "Meet Fenix — my AI Agent".

item.title: v1.0.9 - Fenix Video Section
item.description: Replaced the Fenix AI section with a cinematic video container featuring a dark teal gradient placeholder and centered text overlay.

item.title: v1.0.8 - AI Integration Description Update
item.description: Updated the AI Integration competency description to: "I translate what AI makes possible into what customers actually need — then make sure it ships, scales, and earns trust."
